name: Construction City For Kids
description:
Does your kid want to play with diggers and excavators ?
If your child want to play with a lot of construction machines you have found the right educational game !
There are a lot of things to do at the construction site.
Please help the construction workers in this fun construction game for kids.

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the world of building sites. The best app to be a city builder.

Construction City For Kids is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose the level
* Use all the different machines and vehicles like excavator, earthmover, tractor, truck, dozer, cranes !
* Do activities like building houses with brick and concrete
* cleaning the streets
* house painter : painting houses with your favourite colours
* digging the soil
* building rooftops
* bricklayer : using the concrete mixer
* build an entire town in this city builder game for kids !
* save and share the image of the city with your friends

Run your own construction site!
If your toddler loves to play with diggers and trucks this is the best construction game for your child.

Construction City For Kids is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-A lot of different construction machines and vehicles
-Build houses, paint them and many other construction activities
-Build the rooftop with the help of the crane
-different painting tools and machine to paint the house
-control different machines, such as concrete mixer truck, cranes, excavator, trucks, tractor and forklift
-use all vehicles to complete all levels on the map !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination in the best Construction City For Kids !
Play with the best Construction game, become the best bricklayer in the world !
construction worker, bricklayer, carpenter and smith, who is your favorite ?

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
